import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Style.css' function Signup() { const [nom,setNom]=useState("") const [Prenom,setPrenom]=useState(""); const [Email,setEmail]=useState(""); const [Password,setPassword]=useState(""); const [age,setAge]=useState(0); const [sex,setSex]=useState("Homme"); return ( <>
< div class="wrappery">

Register

{setPrenom(e.target.value)}} required/>

{setEmail(e.target.value)}} required/>
{setPassword(e.target.value)}} required/>
